scripts.cat-js: cat src/js/gol.js src/js/grid.js src/js/index.js src/js/utils.js src/js/toggleContent.js > bundle/bundle.js
scripts.cat-css: cat src/css/base.css src/css/gol.css src/css/navbar.css src/css/header.css src/css/cool.css src/css/cards.css src/css/hide-toggle.css src/css/control-panel.css > bundle/bundle.css
scripts.minify: minify bundle/bundle.js > dist/bundle.min.js & minify bundle/bundle.css > dist/bundle.min.css
scripts.build: mkdir bundle dist 2> /dev/null & npm run cat-js && npm run cat-css && npm run minify
